name: xrtreadlabz-website
description: A modern, responsive website for XRTreadLabz - cutting-edge VR fitness experience

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-files && npm run optimize
scripts.optimize: npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js && npm run optimize-html
scripts.optimize-html: npx html-minifier-terser --input-dir dist --output-dir dist --file-ext html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true
scripts.lint: npm run lint:html && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:gh-pages

author: XRTreadLabz
